title: Mapped Out, Ep. 5: Locked In
description: It's one thing to talk about the power of political redistricting in the abstract, but what does it look like in practice? Over the last decade, Wisconsin's map has let Republicans pass landmark conservative policies, keep a tight grip on the state budget, reshape government agencies and mothball issues despite public support.
author: web-team@wpr.org (Wisconsin Public Radio)
